author: yutazzz
title: Survey+Lobbying of Japanese Law
description: There is no comprehensive survey of Japanese law and no organization to oppose some of the reported excesses of the legal system.
solution: A Comprehensive Survey of Japanese Law + Send at least two letters of opposition to excessive legal systems
